main.name: Ghayoor Ahmad
main.bio: Software Engineer with over 5 years of experience in crafting highly responsive user interfaces and innovative web solutions, specializing in React and Next.js. I excel in JavaScript and TypeScript, translating complex designs into seamless code. I have extensive experience with Node.js, frontend build tools like Webpack and Babel, and version control systems like Git. My strong understanding of responsive and mobile-first design, along with UI/UX principles, is complemented by proficiency in Redux, React Router, Jest, and React Testing Library. Agile-minded and adaptable, I leverage my backend knowledge and RESTful API expertise to drive impactful solutions in collaborative environments.
main.contactmessage: DISCUSS A PROJECT OR JUST WANT TO SAY HI? MY INBOX IS OPEN FOR ALL.!

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

mernProject2.title: RR Store - Coupon system of a Blockchain based survey application Real Research
mernProject2.category: Real Research is an innovative, authentic, and reliable platform that offers its services to a large clientele worldwide. With over 3 million users from over 165 countries, the platform provides a space for data collection via fast and trustworthy surveys from real qualified respondents around the world. Sponsors can promote and advertise products, brands, businesses, events, Youtube videos, and more on the Real Research platform. They can also conduct free surveys using the private survey feature
